column4: Anyone good with UUID entries for External USB Drives in /etc/fstab ?
You don't need UUID - you can use /dev/...
yeah, but on /dev/sdb1 it could be /dev/sdd1 next time I plug it in if another USB drive is hooked up first
So, I want the drive mounted automagic with ext3 fs and remount-rw on errors with the UUID set
